DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether acitretin plus etanercept effective etanercept alone clear psoriasis plaque adult .
DOC.detailed_description: This study include patient moderate severe psoriasis take etanercept 50 mg/week least 3 month ( 12 week ) achieve PASI 75 . They give acitretin 25 mg/day . The combined treatment occur 6 month . Subjects ' progress assess monthly , base improvement PASI PGA score .
DOC.criteria: Adults ( age 18 80 year old ) moderate severe psoriasis ( defined physician global assessment score 3 [ moderate ] high ) etanercept 50 mg SQ weekly achieve PASI 75 12 week treatment etanercept All patient etanercept test TB initiation etanercept Patients < 18 year old > 80 year old Patients etanercept 50 mg SQ weekly Women childbearing potential ( Note : woman nonchildbearing potential , mean surgically sterile [ bilateral oophorectomy , hysterectomy , and/or bilateral tubal ligation ] postmenopausal least 2 year , eligible ) Inability understand consent comply study requirement Uncontrolled hypertriglyceridemia Patients severely impaired hepatic function Patients without health insurance willing pay outofpocket etanercept laboratory test Systemic psoriasis therapy PUVA within past 2 week UVB topical psoriasis therapy ( emollients/moisturizers OTC shampoo ) within past 1 week Patients epilepsy multiple sclerosis
